title: The Cat Years: How My Cat Soulmates Saved Me
description: Whilst still grieving after the loss of her father, cat lover and author Marie Symeou decides to rescue a kitten from an animal shelter. But it turns out that the beautiful kitten actually rescues her. Well, in fact, they rescue each other.Inspired by her new muse, Marie decides to write an inspirational memoir sharing her memories of her beloved cats both past and present - her soulmates.At times uplifting, yet often quite sad, this is an honest account of the authorâ€™s battle with depression and other inner demons that have tormented her throughout her life, and how she found true self-worth and healing through the unconditional love of her amazing cats. A must read for cat lovers, and anyone who appreciates and acknowledges the incredible bond that exists between pet and human
author: Marie Symeou
